name: Bamboo Ben & The Bonzai Boys
description:
Bamboo Ben wants to turn a desert into a bamboo forest, but the Bonzai Boys are trying to stop him! Dash-jump away before they can stab you with their bayonets!

Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • Left-click to plant bamboo
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Shift to dash
  • J to auto-jog
  • P to change perspective
